200.description:
Initialize or process data from the person creation form.
                      Valid combinations:
                      - Both organisationId and rolleId are undefined: Fetch all possible organisations.
                      - organisationId is provided, but rolleId is undefined: Fetch Rollen for the given organisation.
                      - Both organisationId and rolleId are provided: Check if the Rolle can be committed for the organisation.
                      Note: Providing rolleId without organisationId is invalid.

info.title: dBildungs IAM
info.description: The dBildungs IAM server API description

startpasswort.description: Initiales Benutzerpasswort, muss nach der ersten Anmeldung ge√§ndert werden

lastModified.description: Date of the most recent changes for the person

email.description: Contains status and address. Returns email-address verified by OX (enabled) if available, otherwise returns most recently updated one (no prioritized status)

lastModified.description: Date of the most recent changed Personalnummer

code.description: Corresponds to HTTP Status code like 200, 404, 500

lastModifiedZuordnungen.description: Date of the most recent changed personenkontext in the Zuordnungen

personIds.description: An array of IDs for the persons.

email.description: Contains status and address. Returns email-address verified by OX (enabled) if available, otherwise returns most recently updated one (no prioritized status)

code.description: Corresponds to HTTP Status code like 200, 404, 500
Corresponds to HTTP Status code like 200, 404, 500

serviceProviderIds.description: An array of ids for the service providers.

url.description: Can be undefined, if `target` is not equal to `URL`

startpasswort.description: Initiales Benutzerpasswort, muss nach der ersten Anmeldung ge√§ndert werden

code.description: Corresponds to HTTP Status code like 200, 404, 500

canCommit.description: Indicates whether the commit action can be performed.

lastModified.description: Date of the most recent changed personenkontext

code.description: Corresponds to HTTP Status code like 200, 404, 500

importvorgangId.description: The import transaction number. it will be needed to execute the import and download the result

isValid.description: It states if the import transaction contain errors.

totalImportDataItems.description: The total number of data items in the CSV file.

totalInvalidImportDataItems.description: The total number of data items in the CSV file that are invalid.

importvorgangId.description: The id of an import transaction

code.description: Corresponds to HTTP Status code like 200, 404, 500
